titleNullable: UPT Time of Flight 3D Hand Gesture Database
descriptionNullable:
### Context

Although 3D information presents, in the context of hand gesture recognition (and not only), multiple advantages in comparison with the 2D counterpart, up-to-date there are very few 3D hand gesture databases. 
A new dataset, UPT-ToF3D-HGDB, is under construction at the Faculty of Electronics, Telecommunications and Information Technologies (ETcTI, www.etcti.upt.ro) - Applied Electronics Department - from Politehnica University from Timişoara (UPT, www.upt.ro). Having in mind that a high quality ToF video camera is still an expensive equipment (more than 5K €), the dataset is being constructed specifically to support researchers whom are willing to experiment 3D techniques.


### Content

For image aqusition we used a high resolution 3D video camera produced by PMD Technologies GmbH Company, PMD[vision]® CamCube 3.0.

![](https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/kaggle-user-content/o/inbox%2F981835%2Ffd9d87d693636ea277b6173eb96dc401%2Fhard.jpg?generation=1583740786143721&alt=media)

 The optical sensor having a resolution of 200x200 pixel.


### Acknowledgements

If you find the dataset useful, please cite the following works:

 [1] Simion, G.; Caleanu, C.-D., "A ToF 3D database for hand gesture recognition," Electronics and Telecommunications (ISETC), 2012 10th International Symposium on, pp. 363-366, 15-16 Nov. 2012
https://doi.org/10.1109/ISETC.2012.6408145

[2] G. Simion and C.-D Caleanu, "Multi-stage 3D segmentation for ToF based gesture recognition system," 2014 11th International Symposium on Electronics and Telecommunications (ISETC), Timisoara, 2014, pp. 1-4.
https://doi.org/10.1109/ISETC.2014.7010800

[3] Mirsu, R.; Simion, G.; Caleanu, C.D.; Pop-Calimanu, I.M. A PointNet-Based Solution for 3D Hand Gesture Recognition. Sensors 2020, 20, 3226.
Available online, Open Access: https://doi.org/10.3390/s20113226

### Inspiration

Your data will be in front of the world's largest data science community. What questions do you want to see answered?
